message: Use /verification-before-completion before claiming work is done or creating PRs — run verification commands and confirm output first.
Use /code-investigator for efficient targeted code investigation — saves tokens via precise searches.
Use /build-and-fix to auto-detect project type, run build, and fix simple errors (formatting/linting).
Use /ai:route to route this task to the best available AI CLI tool. Run /ai:detect first to see what's installed.
For large codebase scans, use /ai:route — Gemini's 1M token context may be better suited than Claude's 200k.
Use /improve to analyze session learning data and propose concrete improvements to agents, skills, and commands.
Use /self-improve to have multiple AI models critique and improve the kit's own prompts and configurations.
